duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide personalized tax solutions to high-net-worth individuals and privately held companies.
Lead a team of tax professionals, overseeing their assignments and ensuring top-notch client service.
Plan and execute tax compliance and consulting for privately held companies and high net worth individuals.
Drive innovation in financial planning, exceeding client expectations with creative and practical solutions.
Collaborate with clients to ensure minimal federal, state, and local tax liability.
Nurture the growth of tax seniors and associates through thoughtful review, counseling, and leadership.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree in Accounting or related field (Master’s degree a plus)
